# showsVolumeSlider

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates the volume slider is visible in the volume view.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var showsVolumeSlider: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

The volume slider is visible by default. To hide the volume slider, set this property’s value to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].
